channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:03 ATTENTION !!! Threat response
item.description: 🟢 17:03 ATTENTION !!! Threat response #Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:02 Repulse of the alarm in Zaporizhzhya region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zaporizhzhya district

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
